sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The libxslt package contains libxslt libraries and xsltproc.

sect3.title: libxslt libraries
sect3.para: libxslt provides extensions to the libxml2 library to parse files that use the XSLT format.

sect3.title: xsltproc
sect3.para: xsltproc is used to apply XSLT stylesheets to XML documents.
